channel.title: What features would make people download a blank server?
channel.description:
If you were to want to download a "blank server", what would you consider "blank"?
I mean, for me, blank is this:
[ul][li]Rendering (Doesn't need to be complete, just needs to have appearance complete ATLEAST)[/li] [li]Packet System (obviously)[/li] [li]Examples of its systems[/li] [li]JAGGRAB, Ondemand[/li] [li]Item Definitions[/li] [li]Object Definitions[/li] [li]NPC Definitions[/li] [li]Event System[/li] [li]Action System[/li] [li]Tick System[/li][/ul]
That would be a server I would love to download. But really, Combat would stump me, so I would add Combat to that list also.
But I only speak because I know how I would make the rest of the things. What about the [i]average[/i] person in now-a-days RSPS community. What would they describe a blank server that they'd still want to download.
NOTE: This [i]average[/i] person has the will to make things himself.

item.title: What features would make people download a blank server?
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

All of that + Combat + Skill leveling + Documentation.

Read full topic
item.source: What features would make people download a blank server?

item.title: What features would make people download a blank server?

item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

As long as there is a referenceable way to implement other update types I am good to go.

item.title: What features would make people download a blank server?
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:5, topic:534203”]- Documented

  • Good flow
  • Cache tools
  • Obscure protocol completed
  • Rendering (for players, mobs not required)
  • Basic necessities (movement, systems so future content doesn’t lack potential)[/quote]
    same thing for me, but rendering and updating for both players and mobs

Read full topic

[/quote]
Arham asked for opinion, i gave one, the question is what is your problem? If i cant say what i think if it is asked, what does it makes you?[/quote]i mean to say, all arham say plus what i said.
for me.

item.title: What features would make people download a blank server?
item.dc:creator: @crazyfazespy crazyfazespy
item.description:
@crazyfazespy wrote:

For me it would be:
fully working server, i mean bug free and stable what i should have not do anything with connection,
then combat start not fully working combat just a arrow where it shows you, where to start,
then well start of evrything, maby not skills, but still arrow to that class not just buttons or actions,
my point is, more explaination to every thing, where it should be handled. Trading dueling etc, not finished, just basic start
I’M looking for that

Read full topic
